20101206020108.500|20101206020111.000|CCO|KING LIVE."
20101206020111.000|20101206020121.000|CCO|HE IS THE RECIPIENT OF 25 
20101206020121.000|20101206020121.909|CCO|GRAMMYS AND A LIFETIME GRAMMY.
20101206020121.909|20101206020122.818|CCO|HE IS A POLITICAL AND SOCIAL 
20101206020122.818|20101206020123.727|CCO|ACTIVIST.
20101206020123.727|20101206020124.636|CCO|LAST TIME HE WAS ON THIS SHOW, 
20101206020124.636|20101206020125.545|CCO|BY THE WAY, WAS ON THE EVE OF 
20101206020125.545|20101206020126.455|CCO|THE INAUGURATION OF BARACK 
20101206020126.455|20101206020127.364|CCO|OBAMA.
20101206020127.364|20101206020128.273|CCO|WE'LL START THAT WAY, STEVIE.
20101206020128.273|20101206020129.182|CCO|HOW DO YOU THINK HE'S DOING?

20101206020130.091|20101206020131.000|CCO|DOING VERY WELL.
20101206020131.000|20101206020134.333|CCO|I THINK THAT OBVIOUSLY WE WERE 
20101206020134.333|20101206020137.667|CCO|WITH A MESS, UNFORTUNATELY, THE 
20101206020137.667|20101206020141.000|CCO|PREVIOUS -- AT THE END OF THE 
20101206020141.000|20101206020143.000|CCO|PREVIOUS EIGHT YEARS.

20101206020145.000|20101206020147.000|CCO|ALMOST LIKE WHEN YOU GAIN A LOT 
20101206020147.000|20101206020149.000|CCO|OF WEIGHT, IT'S GOING TO TAKE A 
20101206020149.000|20101206020151.000|CCO|MINUTE TO GET IT OFF.

20101206020154.333|20101206020157.667|CCO|GOT INTO, UNFORTUNATELY, THAT 
20101206020157.667|20101206020201.000|CCO|HAPPENED.

20101206020318.500|20101206020321.000|CCO|BLIND, BUT SHORTLY AFTER THAT 
20101206020321.000|20101206020331.000|CCO|BECAUSE OF BEING PREMATURE I HAD
20101206020331.000|20101206020336.000|CCO|THEN FROM BEING IN THE INCUBATOR

20101206020341.000|20101206020342.250|CCO|CONDITION -- 
20101206020342.250|20101206020343.500|CCO|>> Larry: DID YOU SEE SOME 
20101206020343.500|20101206020344.750|CCO|LIGHT?
20101206020344.750|20101206020346.000|CCO|>> I THINK RETROLENTAL 
20101206020346.000|20101206020347.250|CCO|FIBROPLASIA.
20101206020347.250|20101206020348.500|CCO|THAT'S WHAT IT'S CALLED.
20101206020348.500|20101206020349.750|CCO|AND IT HAPPENED FROM THE

20101206020415.286|20101206020416.714|CCO|AGO.
